added.title: Added a Panel Indicator for the layouts
added.subtitle: Activate a layout with your pointer or change your 'Favorite Layout' (per monitor). The indicator is disabled by default.

added.title: Added a setting to group tileGroups in the AppSwitcher (altTab) and Tiling Popup
When dnd-ing a window, hold Super to make the tile preview span multiple rectangles
added.subtitle: This only works in the 'Favorite Layout' or 'Split Tiles' preview modes.

added.title: Added a (hidden) setting to not adapt the Edge-Tiling to the favorite layouts

removed.title: Removed the 'Change favorite layouts' keyboard shortcut
removed.subtitle: This is replaced by the Panel Indicator.

removed.title: Removed the favorite button from the 'Layouts' in the preferences
removed.subtitle: This is replaced by the Panel Indicator.

changed.title: Show the entire Layout when moving a window with the 'Favorite Layout' preview mode
Untile tiled windows, if they are moved to a new monitor or workspace (#114)
Tile Editing Mode: 'Space' will always open the Tiling Popup
Visual tweaks to the preference window

fixed.title: The Tiling Popup will appear on the correct monitor during the 'Grace Period'
fixed.subtitle: When dragging a window to a new monitor there is a short 'Grace Period' (150 ms), in which, if the grab is released on the window, the window will tile to the old monitor.

fixed.title: Fixed artifacts due to the rounded corners of the Changelog window
fixed.subtitle: This only works on Wayland.

fixed.title: Fixed animations being skipped, if an animation was already running (#58)
